secText: Standards: LAFS.1112.RST.2.4, LAFS.1112.RST.3.7, LAFS.1112.RST.3.9, LAFS.1112.WHST.1.2, LAFS.1112.WHST.2.4, LAFS.1112.WHST.2.6, LAFS.1112.WHST.3.7, LAFS.1112.WHST.3.8, LAFS.1112.WHST.4.10

Essential Questions:
1. How can we define rotational motion?
2. How can we calculate rotational motion?
3. How are rotational motion equations similar to linear motion equations?
4. How can we calculate the torque acting on an object?
5. How can we use the moment of inertia to calculate net torque?
6. How can we calculate an object's angular momentum?
7. How can we define static equilibrium?
8. How can we measure the efficiency of a machine?
